title: 2/BD 2/BA, Polished kitchen countertops, in Henderson NV
posting_body: ['South of Las Vegas, in picturesque Henderson, The Bristol at Sunset is everything you could ever want in an apartment community.', 'With proximity to everything from the nature preserves to the excitement, shopping, and entertainment of nearby casinos – when you live here, your most difficult decision will be how to spend your weekends.', '-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                         Featured amenity', '-Oversized walk-in closets', '-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher                                                                                                                                Select units                                                                                                                                Featured amenity', '-Subway tile kitchen backsplash', '-Ceiling fans in dining room', '-Barbecue pavilions and picnic area', '-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance', '-Complimentary Wi-Fi in common areas', '-Pet friendly (breed restrictions apply)', '-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity', '-Relaxing resort-style pool with sundeck and spa                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Prices Change Daily', 'Flexible Lease Terms']
